name: Booking.com
description: World's largest online travel agency for hotels, apartments, and accommodation bookings

name: Airbnb
description: Marketplace for short-term home rentals, experiences, and unique stays worldwide

name: Expedia
description: Full-service travel booking platform for flights, hotels, car rentals, and vacation packages

name: Marriott
description: World's largest hotel company with 30+ brands across luxury, premium, and select categories

name: Hilton
description: Global hospitality company with 18 brands spanning luxury to extended-stay properties

name: Tripadvisor
description: Travel platform with user reviews, price comparison, and booking for hotels and restaurants

name: Kayak
description: Travel search engine comparing prices for flights, hotels, and rental cars across sites

name: Hopper
description: Travel app using AI to predict and monitor flight and hotel prices for best deals

name: Google Flights
description: Google's flight search tool with price tracking, flexible date search, and fare alerts

name: Skyscanner
description: Global flight comparison site searching across airlines and travel agents for cheapest fares

name: Vrbo
description: Vacation rental marketplace focused on whole-home rentals for families and groups

name: Hotels.com
description: Hotel booking site with rewards program offering a free night for every 10 stays

name: Hostelworld
description: Booking platform specializing in hostels and budget accommodation for backpackers

name: GetYourGuide
description: Marketplace for booking tours, attractions, and activities at destinations worldwide

name: Viator
description: Tripadvisor-owned platform for booking sightseeing tours and travel experiences

name: Lonely Planet
description: Travel media company with destination guides, tips, and travel inspiration content

name: Rome2Rio
description: Multi-modal travel search engine showing how to get anywhere by plane, train, bus, or car

name: Kiwi.com
description: Flight booking platform combining airlines for unique itineraries with virtual interlining

name: Scott's Cheap Flights
description: Flight deal alert service that finds and notifies members of cheap flight deals

name: Wanderlog
description: Free trip planner app for organizing itineraries, maps, and travel documents
